name: Jeju IPFS Storage Service
description: Decentralized file storage with x402 micropayments. Upload, pin, and retrieve files from local IPFS nodes.

skills.description: Upload and pin a file to Jeju IPFS network with optional x402 payment

skills.name: Pin Existing CID

skills.name: Retrieve File from IPFS
skills.description: Fetch file contents from IPFS by CID

skills.name: List My Pinned Files
skills.description: Get list of files pinned by owner address or agent

skills.name: Calculate Storage Cost
skills.description: Estimate cost for storing a file with given size and duration

skills.name: Get Storage Statistics
